name: azuflow®
description: azuflow® is an acid solution of nitrogen and sulfur. azuflow® is a soil acidifying product, especially recommended for soils with a pH greater than 7.5, where it improves the availability of certain nutrients for crops (such as phosphorus, iron, zinc, manganese, copper, cobalt and boron). It is highly affected by high pH. It can also be used as an acidifier for irrigation waters with high pH, ​​where the precipitation of certain salts is favored.
